a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cost of space launches to low Earth orbit
Cost to launch one kilogram of payload mass to low Earth orbit as part of a dedicated launch. This data is
Launch cost per kilogram of payload (constant 2021 US$ per kilogram)
Data source: CSIS Aerospace Security Project (2022)
Note: Small vehicles carry up to 2,000 kg to low Earth orbit, medium ones between 2,000 and 20,000 kg, and heavy ones more than 20,000
